short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say what you want typed and Textify will type it onto the page for you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you know most people speak four times faster than they type? You can experience this yourself in seconds. 🎤💬

Our Voice-to-Text App

We believe in making things simple, secure, and efficient. Our voice-to-text app embodies these principles. It only listens when you tell it to, capturing your voice with a press of a button. No background listening, no unwanted recordings. 🔒

The app is powered by cutting-edge AI that transcribes your speech into text quickly and accurately. ⚡ It’s built to understand you, no matter your accent, and it gets it right, every time. 🗣️

It works wherever you do. From leaving comment on docments to sending emails or chatting online, our app integrates smoothly across various internet windows and applications. 🌐 Just press the button, speak, and watch your words appear. ✨

And here’s the best part: it’s free. We’re currently in a beta period, so you can try it out at no cost. 🆓

Key Features:

	•	Privacy First: Records only when you press the button. 🔐
	•	Fast and Accurate: Instant, precise transcriptions. ⏱️
	•	Accent-Friendly: Designed to work with all accents. 🌍
	•	Universal Compatibility: Works in many internet windows and applications. 🖥️
	•	Effortless Use: Just press a button to activate. 👍
	•	Free Beta: Enjoy all features for free during the beta period. 🎉

Our voice-to-text app is here to make your digital communication simpler and more efficient. Try it out and see the difference. 🚀
